website_summaries.verdict: The Epson EX9200 Pro Wireless WUXGA 3LCD Projector offers high resolution for showing images with fine detail, and is both light enough to carry easily and bright enough for a small to midsize room.
pros: 1.2x zoom.Excellent quality for data images in testing
Better video than most data projectors

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for over a year now, and I would just like to say how much enjoyment I've gotten out of it. It's a very bright picture and very colorful and clear, not as clear as a 4k tv, but it's a 12 foot screen.. I also wanted to comment about gaming. I don't experience any picture lag or jitters or anything undesirable except my next sentence: The projector is LOUD. The fan is always screaming. Yes, I've cleaned the filter. I would buy it again if I had to buy another projector because I'm happy with its performance and reliability. It's just so loud..
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Wireless only works if your source content doesn't require an internet connection
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works really well. I use it at work during meetings and we all agree that it's a great purchase. My only complaint is the wireless connection feature through wifi doesn't work for what I want. We have it ceiling mounted and use it to project web based content which means the source device needs to be connected to the internet with wifi, thus making it necessary to connect to the projector with HDMI rather than the wifi that the projector emits.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our Church and it's a big improvement over the older one. It's noisier and runs hotter but does look better. I don't get the impression we'll get 5-10 years out of this but we'll see. We're running it on about a 10ft wide screen that we made ourselves from "Carl's" screen materials which you can google if you're interested. For $80, we now have a perfect screen and saved a ton of money. With the lights off, this really looks great, it's not movie theater bright, but it's very good.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Love this projector!
customer_reviews.text: The Epson EX9200 Pro WUXGA 3LCD Projector is excellent! Very high resolution and very good color rendition so I can project large and detailed maps and drawings to large audiences. Not that expensive either. Love that I can just turn it off and unplug it immediately without needing to wait for a cool down cycle like older projectors. Convenient size and simple operation. This projector does everything I want and I'm a pretty demanding projector user having used dozens of others over the past decade. This is the best portable projector I've used so far.;
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Oey

customer_reviews.title: its working fine..
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it alot as yet, but so far, its working fine...similar to the last Epson I had but this one is definately higher resolution. It has a modest zoom and several correction buttons for bulb brightness, paralax, focus, etc. Pretty easy to figure out attachment to computer. I got it cause I needed HD and I wasnt able to locate any other brands compatible to this. However, I believe Epson has discontinued production on this model and Im not aware of any HD replacements theyve made as yet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Yorke

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector has a very crystal clear image, rich in contrast, black looks really black, has a decent lamp lifespan, I am projecting in a 120 inch bright screen, from a 15 ft distance, and looks beautiful, has all kinds of input and has a front and back remote receiver highly recommended for bright and dark rooms, business or home use.
customer_reviews.author: C. Deras

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that I would suggest as an improvement to this device would be to have the ability to output the audio to external speakers. I was looking to replace a 1200 lumens projector with something more powerful while not breaking the bank. This is exactly what I was looking for. It was easy to set up and works perfectly with all of my devices (iPhones, iPad Air, PS3, PS4, and desktop PC).
customer_reviews.author: JTorleif

customer_reviews.title: High pitched noise; unclear instructions for networking; wouldn't connect to PC using HDMI
customer_reviews.text: The projector is very bright and has decent sound for onboard speakers. The chassis is high quality plastic. The fan is noisy and the projector emits a loud, high pitched tone while operating. Because of the poor instructions it took a while to figure out what i was expected to do to project over LAN, which never actually worked. I was able to connect via HDMI once, but thereafter my computer wouldn't recognize the projector. I have another projector that I tested and it connected instantly. Aside from that, with horrible return policy from the seller, I would not recommend this product or the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Arcesso

customer_reviews.title: Would like a sound output
customer_reviews.text: Very bright display, even in a bright room! Would like a sound output, but built in speaker is fine for a small to medium size room.. using for PowerPoint presentations. Even after being on all day it was cool enough to put in the case in less then 5 min.
customer_reviews.author: Fred A Cnota

customer_reviews.title: HD quality is very good projecting on a plain white wall
customer_reviews.text: HD quality is very good projecting on a plain white wall, had a problem with it saving the rear projection settings, had to input them everytime we rebooted but It's not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: ErnestT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great for showing my photos via my iPad. The WiFi setup is easy and the picture is fantastic. The Epson app only allows you to view stuff in your photo library, but if you get a Lightning to HDMI adapter, it will project the iPad screen, so now I have a Netflix projection TV in my bedroom! Sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: This projector is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: This projector is perfect for me. I am a Safety and Leadership trainer/consultant and deliver programs at client sites all over this planet. I have to leave the lights on enough for my participants to use their handouts and interact. This projector is so clear and bright and easy to set up and take down that I'm delighted. Here are two photos from a safety class. The colors and images are sharp and are represented accurately from my laptop. Just love it. I know some people didn't like the speaker and I didn't find it effective, either. But I have a small Bose speaker that is lightweight and fills the room with perfect sound, so the combination just ROCKS.
customer_reviews.author: WendeWylie

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is not about the quality but about my inability to read the details better. There is no audio out
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My only complaint is not about the quality but about my inability to read the details better. There is no audio out. Most wouldn't need one anyway, probably. The contrast, brightness and color are good, especially for this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Chris the Techie

customer_reviews.title: Best projector I've ever had hands down!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing projector! Bright enough for some light being cast into the room as long as it isn't directly on the screen. The size of the projected image is much bigger than previous projectors I've had in the past and can fill almost my entire wall. Only CON - makes noise constantly, almost like the buzz from a hard drive when being accessed, amplified significantly. If you have a decent sound system you won't notice but if the volume is low it can be maddening.
customer_reviews.author: Razel42

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this projector
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this projector. It is bright, and images are sharp. I especially like the feature where it displays JPEG files directly off of a flash drive inserted in one of its USB ports. Since I do not own a laptop, I simply export my PowerPoint presentations as JPEG files and copy them to a flash drive. The projector's remote easily controls the slide show from anywhere in the room.
customer_reviews.author: TitaniumGamer

customer_reviews.title: ... owned this projector for a few months and absolutely love it. I use it in a room with ...
customer_reviews.text: I've now owned this projector for a few months and absolutely love it. I use it in a room with a good amount of Ambient light and it still looks phenomenal. The speaker is terrible, but you shouldn't buy a projector expecting to use the speaker for much anyway.I play Xbox One, watch movies, etc. and have had no issues at all. When in normal mode, it does get a little noisy, but that doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: JosiahB

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and is easy to store, but can be slow regarding connecting to my laptop
customer_reviews.author: mallori henceroth

customer_reviews.title: So clear and bright!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is worth every penny. I was worried about spending a lot on a projector but I was hoping it performed the way they said it does... and it does! I use this in a Fully Lit room with windows and it is bright and clear. It is very impressive and quiet... unlike my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Merhumina

customer_reviews.title: Best Budget Projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector is a MUST have for every school, church, cinema hall, etc. Its very sharp, and gives you varying view angles. I love using this machine with my Dell Inspiron 13inch. I cannot just say more. Very clear in even in an open area with much sunlight. Comparatively, its better than most expensive ones on the market. I just love the wireless feature.
customer_reviews.author: John Kwame Nutakor

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, but the wireless is not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought several of these for our overseas offices. No complains came back. I tried it out myself and the quality is great. The only thing I would say is that wireless feature is not easy to use and very difficult to get working correctly.
customer_reviews.author: John Troup

customer_reviews.title: The display is set at 1/2 brightness and it works great even in the daytime
customer_reviews.text: Incredible projector! We use it in our church. The display is set at 1/2 brightness and it works great even in the daytime. The clarity and definition is outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great projector for meetings. Sharp quality image. I wish the sound had a better output option to speakers
customer_reviews.author: Alissha Gordin

customer_reviews.title: Video quality is REALY GOOD! If you are using for a home theater
customer_reviews.text: Video quality is REALY GOOD! If you are using for a home theater, this projector will work well. I had purchased it for Business use, and the lack of Audio out is a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: This Projector works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, bright display, wifi makes it easy to project from phone or laptop without a physical connection I'm using it to display on a painted wall at a size of 155" X 87" (177" Diagonal)
customer_reviews.author: Snow Man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture. Can be used for powerpoint presentations or ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture. Can be used for powerpoint presentations or to watch TV on a large screen. The brightness is high enough that you can leave the lights on and get a good image quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed F. Kilani, Ph.D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful image, very bright
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful image, very bright. Works extremely well in fully lit rooms, even without a projector screen, and in dark rooms it feels like a movie projector. It does run hot after a couple of hours of use but that is to be expected. The bag that comes with it is perfect, carries all of the cables and the remote without a problem. Overall, extremely satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great projector with good features at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is such an improvement over my old projector and costs less than the one I bought years ago. If I had one complaint it's that there is no provision for mounting on a tripod. The resolution is good. The image is bright. I love the automatic focus and keystone features.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Works great in the daytime
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture. Very bright I use it for presentations all the time in a well lit conference room.
customer_reviews.author: MOHAMMAD FAROOQI

customer_reviews.title: Was a good projector for 2 years then i broke it with ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a good projector for 2 years then i broke it with canned air. Don't use canned air on a running projector. Fireball shot out of it and picture is all blurry now.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Professional level Projector
customer_reviews.text: No problem installation and setup. I was able to set it up without even opening the manual. Great clarity and can see quite well in a totally lighted room. No extra dongles needed for wireless. Would have liked a LAN port option for remote management.
customer_reviews.author: Truth Seeker

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a conference room. The screen is clear and bright, to the point that it does not need a screen. It is easy to see in a bright room with the lights on. Great projector.
customer_reviews.author: KenW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful piece of electronics. Very good resolution and user-friendly features. Well-designed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe  Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: Epson projectors are just AWESOME, this is the second I've ordered, the quality of the image is great, the colors are vibrant and these projectors last forever, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Dude

customer_reviews.title: Wireless functionality is not much useful. Reception is good
customer_reviews.text: Wireless functionality is not much useful. Reception is good. But a bit noisey. I guess worth the money if you spending less than $700
customer_reviews.author: Raja

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this vendor
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this item because it does not work but they are charging me a 15% restocking fee. So they sell me garbage and it’s gonna cost me $120 To send it back, Plus I have to pay postage to return.
customer_reviews.author: Joe E.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This was the projector that I upgraded to from the ViewSonic PJD5134 SVGA DLP Projector. This projector is amazing! The picture is so much clearer and isn't bothered by household lights at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well in all light and wish wireless was web based
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and works well in our conference room in all lighting. Easily mounted with the Universal Projector Drop-in Ceiling Mount from Amazon. I believe the interface for wireless connection works well, but I wish they had a web interface to get it from. The wireless technology ends up not being used because people don't know it is there. You have to install an application to use the projector. It would be so easy to tell them to go to this website and follow the directions. But if that is what I want I have to create it. In fairness, they never claimed to have web access.
customer_reviews.author: Todd C Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Conference Room Projector
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Just had our first presentation on this and it worked well. No problem reading text on a PowerPoint in a small conference room with lots of windows and natural light.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing for movies
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing for movies. I hoped it would be better for gaming, but still very good. Just one thing. It tends to get pretty loud if left on for a little while but the sound of your movie or whatever your doing on it will mask that noise.
customer_reviews.author: Irish_MONSTeR

customer_reviews.title: Full HD
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s not noisy; you can barely hear the fan.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Velez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good tool for viewing , its better feature is the auto-adjustment when you connect your computer.
customer_reviews.author: Atel C.

customer_reviews.title: No plug n play
customer_reviews.text: This isnt a homeowners projector unless you want to deal with aggravation. Not one external output and unless you have an it guy. This isnt for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An essentially perfect projector. Received on time and as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: BobZ

customer_reviews.title: Great projector
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully once I figured out how to make it remember my settings. I use it for 4:3 format on a big screen and it kept defaulting to the 9:5 (wide screen). Otherwise all is great.
customer_reviews.author: mlb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, Fast Shipping and a Fair Price. Doesn't get any better!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Jaggers

customer_reviews.title: Colour is great.
customer_reviews.text: It should have an audio out. Only drawback. Colour is great.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory FERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 5 Stars but the unit was not as easy to setup as our Toshiba projector. The quality of the picture is just as good as the Toshiba, maybe a bit more colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Blu-tooth compatable with your devise! Where have you been all my life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our camera club meetings. Great color and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: dburk

customer_reviews.title: The best projector I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing projector! Just go buy it. Yes, you can hear it when teaching in a classroom on normal mode, but barely. Besides, if you're listening that closely to the projector, you're obviously not engaged in the material you're presenting. I've only thought about the noise three times: reading reviews before I got it, when I first set it to normal/eco, and now that I'm writing this review. All projectors get warm no matter what. This thing is compact, bright, displays an excellent pictures, and comes with a case!
customer_reviews.author: taharad

customer_reviews.title: Works great! The end of the power cord that attaches ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! The end of the power cord that attaches to the projector is pretty loose, and something you're going to want to secure, but otherwise the picture and features are excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Weishahn

customer_reviews.title: Epson projectors are great!
customer_reviews.text: Really - Really good product. Many more features than I needed. Look carefully over the lesser models before you buy this one, My previous EPSON was a lesser model and I was very happy with the many years of service it gave me ( that one was stolen). Mu new Epson as selected because of the outstanding performance of the old one. One fault was the documentation and user instructions with this new model was not up to the level I expected from Epson.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stanley Kintner

customer_reviews.title: IT RESETS EVERY TIME YOU USE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This projector does not have any stable software to allow you to connect wirelessly. Also there is no movie mode or ability to stream to it which makes this thing unusable. Worse than all of this, when you set the keystone to get a properly formatted picture, it does it within the window, not the full screen size and IT RESETS EVERY TIME YOU USE IT! completely unacceptable behavior
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great color and brightness
customer_reviews.text: I just tested it and meet and beat expectations! Great color and brightness. I'm not yet sure of actual longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Weck-AP

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and shows true color
customer_reviews.text: This is an excelant Projector. I use it for my Sculpture lectures. My girlfriend uses it for her bird lectures. It is easy to use and shows true color.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but otherwise like it so far
customer_reviews.text: A bit heavy for toting to meetings, but otherwise like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Martin

customer_reviews.title: This projector qaulity is amazing. I made the right decision when I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: This projector qaulity is amazing. I made the right decision when I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this unit
customer_reviews.text: Although I have not used the projector a lot, I am very impressed with the image quality and brightness. It has many features I will likely not use but when you upgrade from a 7 year old projector to a modern and feature rich model, the difference is night and day. I highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: cyberthingy

customer_reviews.title: Not real black, Black in the image.
customer_reviews.text: This LCD projector doesn't have real black-blacks in the image and I can hear a shutter closing during the black-out times. It has good features but I think I will go with DLP next time.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and adjust
customer_reviews.text: Bright and detailed image. Easy to setup and adjust. My only complaint is the black level is not nearly as black as a laptop or monitor.
customer_reviews.author: J. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Projector,
customer_reviews.text: The resolution is very good, you can see little details very clear, you don’t need a dark room in order to see the screen, even at large screen size, and it will do fine with ambient light. Perfect for classrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos D. Martin Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Epson has a winner here
customer_reviews.text: This projector is everything the reviews say it is. Excellent bright images even in a moderately lit room. Easy to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy99

customer_reviews.title: This projector is awesome. Very clear and dynamic
customer_reviews.text: This projector is awesome. Very clear and dynamic. We are going to use it for outdoor movies in our neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a week!!!
customer_reviews.text: After 14 hours over all and using 5 times the projector refuses to turn on it just loudly blows air at different speeds then turns off. I would think after how much I spent a bulb could last at least a week! Good image quality for the 14 hours of life. I just hope they have good support and replace it or fix it. I will update rating depending on support and longevity of reliability.
customer_reviews.author: william b

customer_reviews.title: killer projector for the money!  it is not LED but has every other functionality you could want
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a high resolution projector and did not want to spend a huge amount of money at the same time. this one is HD (1920x1080), supports wireless display and supports display of two different PCs at the same time. I was concerned if the projector would be bright enough with lights right above the screen and that all people could easily see the screen. It was in ECO-mode and it was still bright enough to easily see. this is not the smallest projector but I feel it is very nice, easy to use and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: derekdal

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what i need, it fits and is impressive the way it does all it is suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and clear images
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my MacBook Pro displaying high-definition satellite imagery and video, clear and crisp images with good detail.
customer_reviews.author: Geographer

customer_reviews.title: The best investment one could make
customer_reviews.text: The best investment one could make. The wireless is a great feature. The EX9200 Pro is great in any light. And set up is a snap!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: I attached this projector to my cable box and smart blue ray player with sound through Samsung multi room set up. Screen is projected on bare wall 15' diagonal. Picture and sound is great! Daylight and night. I use Eco settings the bulb is so bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The image quality is exceptional, but I am having ...
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is exceptional, but I am having problems with the wireless software. It is not too friendly to use. Jaime
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Fuente

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it seems to be working fine. We will see? I like the image quality.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Hoag

customer_reviews.title: Excellent PC Screen Rendering Easy setup Smart connection Detection Low ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very crisp clear images and video. Excellent PC Screen Rendering Easy setup Smart connection Detection Low Noise Very Light and nice case Cons: Very Hard to show things in Mirror mode where you can see on your notebook as well as projection.
customer_reviews.author: A. Branch

customer_reviews.title: Works great. But
customer_reviews.text: Works great. But, download apps from Apple store (iProjector) for phone or Web site for laptop. We're not on CD, just links..
customer_reviews.author: Roger Cain

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great light, and you can conct three devices at same time
customer_reviews.author: Jose G.

customer_reviews.title: Used for Power Point and short video
customer_reviews.text: Used it for a presentation. I would recommend becoming familiar with it prior to using it to make a presentation. Was able to use it in a lighted room, about ten foot throw.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: The reason I gave this item 1 star is because ...
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave this item 1 star is because I did not order this item. My account was hacked and someone ordered this product and the Gigabyte product. My credit card had to be canceled because this person charged, between the 2 products, over $1,300.
customer_reviews.author: Francine

customer_reviews.title: not happy about this
customer_reviews.text: This projector blows hot air into the conference room. I need to return it, but the 30-day return window has passed... not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

product_meta.title: Epson EX9200 Pro Wireless WUXGA 3LCD Projector
product_meta.description: 3200 lumens color brightness and 3200 lumens white brightness. Pro-quality; widescreen resolution; wireless, MHL.
feature_bullets: Look for two numbers: 3200 lumens Color Brightness for more accurate, vivid color3200 lumens White Brightness for well-lit rooms

Pro-quality projector - WUXGA resolution (1920 x 1200) offers 4.5x more resolution than SVGA for Full HD 1080p content; Throw Ratio Range: 1.38 (Zoom:Wide), 1.68 (Zoom:Tele).Speaker:2 W (mono).Fan Noise:ECO mode: 29 dB.Normal mode: 37 dB
Wireless - project from your laptop, tablet, or smartphone4 without plugging into the projector, so you can move freely about the room

Share HD videos directly from your smartphone, tablet or streaming device - supports MHL-enabled devices, including Chromecast and Roku Streaming Stick.Compatible with the latest laptops and media players — supports HDMI, the standard in connectivity, for digital video and audio with just one cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars155 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
